title: as i said keep no open my account
body:
thy tel me this and im not the one who ban the account 

The context of this suspension has been explained. We will not remove or modify it, and we consider the matter closed.

We will not reconsider and this is our final decision.

Regards,

Battlethirst of Chaos

Player Support Specialist

"Chaos has an unquenchable thirst." 
yes unquenchable thirst. with no help me open my account wish youre account get bannned as same as me who some one hack you and you will know youre god

replies.body: yes but it wasnt me the one who bann it plz open it

I went ahead and pulled up your tickets and account to see what might have happened for those agents to say something like that. It looks like this account had been banned, then you proceeded to spam our ticket system. Spamming tickets isn't a good way to get those agent's attention, as each message sent bumps your ticket to the back. 

You've had several tickets responded to, and it was fully explained what happened and why. If you need further context, you can look back through your tickets.
